  1. 227: Kumar

    17/08/11

    100 strangers, number 2.

    I'm already beginning to dislike this project. Not actually sure how interested I am in shooting people.

  2. 226: Coventry parkour

    16/08/11

    There's something I really love about walking around with a camera, trying to find stuff to take photos of. It can lead to some cool, spontaneous meetings with people I wouldn't have otherwise come across.

    Tudor and Payam are two of the friendliest people I've met in a while and following them around Coventry was a good way to spend a Sunday afternoon. That town seems like the perfect place for parkour.

    Kind of fucked up the processing of some of these - I'm using Fireworks for PC this week for a couple of stupid reasons, and I can't get it to do what I want most of the time. I took some other photos around Coventry that I might post a bit later, but definitely not until I'm back on Aperture.

  3. 223-225

    14/08/11

    I'm really enjoying taking photos at the moment. Not sure about some of the results, but I'm having fun trying. That's the important thing, right?

    Had a few drinks and watched a Stewart Lee DVD on Friday night, then remembered I hadn't taken any photos.

  4. 222: Burnt

    10/08/11

    I've never been sure if it's meant to be 'burnt' or 'burned', but apparently both are okay.

    Staff boarding up the furniture shop that got attacked last night.

    These are a bit crap. Had to be quick though because the police were closing the roads.
